oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unusual formation of thiaisoporphyrins from 21-thiaporphyrins
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHOSH, A
LEE, WZ
RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: BORON COMPLEXES
PORPHYRIN
PORPHODIMETHENES
CALIXPYRROLES
PORPHOMETHENES
CALIXPHYRINS
MACROCYCLES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report the unusual formation of thiaisoporphyrins containing bridging sp(3) meso carbon between two pyrroles when 21-thiaporphyrins were reacted with PhBCl2 in dry toluene at reflux temperature.
